xdy-pf2e-workbench.spellCardNotFound: The spell card could not be found. Casting {spell} at minimum level for that spell.

automationClientSettings.hint: Enable and configure automation for players
automationClientSettings.name: Client Automation Settings
automationClientSettings.label: Manage Client Automation Settings

automationWorldSettings.hint: Enable and configure automation for GMs
automationWorldSettings.name: World Automation Settings
automationWorldSettings.label: Manage World Automation Settings

qolWorldSettings.hint: Enable and configure quality of life settings for GMs
qolWorldSettings.name: World QoL Settings
qolWorldSettings.label: Manage World QoL Settings

abpVariantAllowItemBonuses.hint: World setting to not disable item bonuses when using ABP.
abpVariantAllowItemBonuses.name: (World) Do not disable item bonuses when using ABP.

addGmRKButtonToNpc.hint: Check to add Recall Knowlege button to NPCs. Currently only for the skill, lores will have to be handled manually.
addGmRKButtonToNpc.name: Add Recall Knowledge button to NPCs.
addGmRKButtonToNpc.hideNpcName: Hide NPC name on Recall Knowledge message.
addGmRKButtonToNpc.hideSkill: Hide skill name on Recall Knowledge message.

automatedAnimationOn.hint: World setting for using the module automated-animations to play animation and/or sound on a strike miss. Save settings to show/hide additional options.
automatedAnimationOn.name: (World) use the module automated-animations to play animation and/or sound on a strike miss.

automatedAnimationOnFailAnimation.hint: World setting for animation to play on strike miss, default is from the JB2A_DnD5e module which must be installed for it to be usable. Leave empty to play no animation.
automatedAnimationOnFailAnimation.name: (World) animation to play on strike miss.

automatedAnimationOnFailSound.hint: World setting for sound to play on strike miss, default is from the soundfxlibrary module which must be installed for it to be usable. If this matches the name of a rollable table or a playlist a random text result from this will be used as the path to the sound instead. Leave empty to play no sound.
automatedAnimationOnFailSound.name: (World) sound to play on strike miss.

automatedAnimationOnCritFailAnimation.hint: World setting for animation to play on strike critical miss, default is from the JB2A_DnD5e module which must be installed for it to be usable. Leave empty to play no animation.
automatedAnimationOnCritFailAnimation.name: (World) animation to play on strike critical miss.

automatedAnimationOnCritFailSound.hint: World setting for sound to play on strike critical miss, default is from the soundfxlibrary module which must be installed for it to be usable. If this matches the name of a rollable table or a playlist a random text result from this will be used as the path to the sound instead. Leave empty to play no sound.
automatedAnimationOnCritFailSound.name: (World) sound to play on strike critical miss.

automatedAnimationOnCritSuccessAnimation.hint: World setting for animation to play on strike critical success, default is from the JB2A_DnD5e module which must be installed for it to be usable. Leave empty to play no animation.
automatedAnimationOnCritSuccessAnimation.name: (World) animation to play on strike critical success.

automatedAnimationOnCritSuccessSound.hint: World setting for sound to play on strike critical success, default is from the soundfxlibrary module which must be installed for it to be usable. If this matches the name of a rollable table or a playlist a random text result from this will be used as the path to the sound instead. Leave empty to play no sound.
automatedAnimationOnCritSuccessSound.name: (World) sound to play on strike critical success.

automatedAnimationOnSuccessAnimation.hint: World setting for animation to play on strike success, default is from the JB2A_DnD5e module which must be installed for it to be usable. Leave empty to play no animation.
automatedAnimationOnSuccessAnimation.name: (World) animation to play on strike success.

automatedAnimationOnSuccessSound.hint: World setting for sound to play on strike success, default is from the soundfxlibrary module which must be installed for it to be usable. If this matches the name of a rollable table or a playlist a random text result from this will be used as the path to the sound instead. Leave empty to play no sound.
automatedAnimationOnSuccessSound.name: (World) sound to play on strike success.

automatedAnimationMissOffTarget.hint: Client setting for making miss and critical miss animations appear at a random spot near the missed target token.
automatedAnimationMissOffTarget.name: Make miss animations appear off-target.

applyPersistentAllow.hint: Select who is allowed to set the option to automatically apply persistent damage/healing. Save settings to show/hide additional options.
applyPersistentAllow.name: Who is allowed to set the option to automatically apply persistent damage/healing.

applyPersistentDamage.hint: Client setting to automatically apply persistent damage rolled by the Persistent Damage module. Save settings to show/hide additional options.
applyPersistentDamage.name: Automatically apply persistent damage rolled by the Persistent Damage module.

applyPersistentDamageSeparateMessage.name: Show separate persistent damage message
applyPersistentDamageSeparateMessage.hint: Client setting to show separate persistent damage message

applyPersistentHealing.hint: Client setting to automatically apply persistent healing rolled by the system. Save settings to show/hide additional options.
applyPersistentHealing.name: Automatically apply persistent healing rolled by the system.

applyPersistentHealingSeparateMessage.hint: Client setting to show separate persistent healing message
applyPersistentHealingSeparateMessage.name: Show separate persistent healing message

applyEncumbranceBasedOnBulk.hint: World setting to automatically apply encumbrance based on bulk. (Uses system code which considers 5 bulk + 9 light to not exceed 5 bulk.)
applyEncumbranceBasedOnBulk.name: (World) automatically apply encumbrance based on bulk.

autoCollapseItemChatCardContent.hint: Client setting to automatically collapse item chat card content.
autoCollapseItemChatCardContent.name: Automatically collapse item chat card content.
autoCollapseItemChatCardContent.collapsedDefault: Collapsed by default, click title to expand.
autoCollapseItemChatCardContent.nonCollapsedDefault: Expanded by default, click title to collapse.

autoExpandDamageRolls.hint: Client setting to automatically expand damage rolls (foundry default is all damage rolls collapsed). Click dice roll to expand/collapse.
autoExpandDamageRolls.name: Automatically expand damage rolls.
autoExpandDamageRolls.expandedNew: New damage rolls expand (also checks last three messages on refresh).

autoRollDamageAllow.hint: Select who is allowed to set the option to Autoroll damage on a hit. Save settings to show/hide additional options.
autoRollDamageAllow.name: Who is allowed to set the option to Autoroll damage on a hit.

autoRollDamageForStrike.hint: Client setting to autoroll damage for strikes that hit. Note that critical hits roll critical damage.
autoRollDamageForStrike.name: Autoroll damage for strikes that hit.

autoRollDamageForSpellAttack.hint: Client setting to autoroll damage for spell attacks that hit. Note that critical hits always roll normal damage.
autoRollDamageForSpellAttack.name: Autoroll damage for spell attacks that hit.

autoRollDamageForSpellNotAnAttack.hint: Client setting to *always* autoroll normal damage for *non-attack* spells when they are cast.
autoRollDamageForSpellNotAnAttack.name: Autoroll damage for cast spells that are not attacks.

autoRollDamageNotifyOnSpellCardNotFound.hint: Client setting to notify when a spell attack is rolled and no spell card was found to roll damage for.
autoRollDamageNotifyOnSpellCardNotFound.name: Notify when a spell attack is rolled and no spell card was found.

autoGainDyingAtZeroHP.hint: Client setting to automatically increase Dying at 0 HP.
autoGainDyingAtZeroHP.name: Automatically increase Dying at 0 HP.

giveUnconsciousIfDyingRemovedAt0HP.hint: Client setting to automatically give unconscious if Dying removed while at 0 HP.
giveUnconsciousIfDyingRemovedAt0HP.name: Automatically give unconscious if Dying removed at 0 HP.

autoRemoveDyingAtGreaterThanZeroHP.hint: Client setting to automatically remove Dying when healed to above 0 HP.
autoRemoveDyingAtGreaterThanZeroHP.name: Automatically remove Dying when healed to above 0 HP.

autoRemoveUnconsciousAtGreaterThanZeroHP.hint: Client setting to automatically remove unconscious if healed to greater than 0 HP.
autoRemoveUnconsciousAtGreaterThanZeroHP.name: Automatically remove unconscious if healed to greater than 0 HP.

giveWoundedWhenDyingRemoved.hint: Client setting to automatically give Wounded condition when Dying condition is removed.
giveWoundedWhenDyingRemoved.name: Automatically give Wounded when Dying is removed.

toggleUndetectedWithVisibilityState.hint: (Experimental) World setting for using token visilibity for toggling Undetected condition. Won't affect Loot actors.
toggleUndetectedWithVisibilityState.name: (Experimental) (World) Use visibility to toggle Undetected condition.

decreaseFrightenedConditionEachTurn.hint: Client setting to automatically decrease the frightened condition each turn for characters, npcs and familiars.
decreaseFrightenedConditionEachTurn.name: Automatically decrease the frightened condition each turn.

enableAutomaticMove.hint: Select to enable setting initiative of combatant outside it's own turn to just before the current combatant, normally because the current combatant has killed the selected combatant. Due to rounding several combatants may show the same initiative in the list.
enableAutomaticMove.name: Setting initiative to just before the current combatant.

heroPointHandler.addOne: Section 2 - Add one Hero Point to selected character from those logged in (defaults to random character when timer expires)
heroPointHandler.doWhat: Section 1 - Choose what to do to the Hero Points of all characters with the following value
heroPointHandler.hint: Check to enable Hero Point handler feature with an optional keybind to open a dialog that can reset or add Hero Points for all characters, add one Hero Point to a random (or selected) character and, most importantly, start a timer to make the dialog reappear after (by default) 60 minutes.
heroPointHandler.instructions: Note that the timer is paused while this dialog is open. Close this dialog without pressing any of these buttons to unpause the timer, or press the appropriate button to do what the button says.
heroPointHandler.name: Enable Hero Point handler.
heroPointHandler.noTimerLabel: Submit changes with no timer. Will stop any existing timer.
heroPointHandler.resetToForAll: Hero Points reset to {heroPoints} for all
heroPointHandler.showAfter: Show dialog again after this many minutes
heroPointHandler.title: Hero Point Handler
heroPointHandler.willBeResetIn: Hero Point Handler returns in {remainingMinutes} minutes ({time}).

heroPointHandlerKey.hint: Keybind to open the Hero Point handler dialog that enables resetting and adding Hero Points with an hourly reminder
heroPointHandlerKey.name: Keybind to open the Hero Point handler dialog.

heroPointHandlerStartTimerOnReady.hint: Check to automatically start the Hero Point handler timer when the game is ready.
heroPointHandlerStartTimerOnReady.name: Automatically start Hero Point Handler.

callHotbarMacro.hint: Call hotbar macro on page {page} position {column}
callHotbarMacro.name: Call hotbar macro on page {page} position {column}

maxHeroPoints.hint: World setting for the maximum number of Hero Points for a character.
maxHeroPoints.name: (World) maximum number of Hero Points.

moveBeforeCurrentCombatantContextMenu.name: Move selected combatant before the current combatant.

moveBeforeCurrentCombatantKey.hint: World keybind for moving selected combatant to before the current combatant, normally because the current combatant has killed the selected combatant. Due to rounding several combatants may show the same initiative in the list.
moveBeforeCurrentCombatantKey.name: (World) keybind to move selected combatant before current combatant.

notifications.cantMystify: You cannot mystify this token. Is it on the active scene, and, are you a GM?

npcMystifier.hint: Check to enable npc mystifier, renaming tokens on the active scene based on their traits if Ctrl (configurable) is clicked when adding to scene. Save settings to show/hide additional options.
npcMystifier.name: Enable npc mystifier.

npcMystifierAddRandomNumber.hint: Check to enable adding a random number when mystifying npcs. Note that if the token or actor already has a number as a suffix this will not work well.
npcMystifierAddRandomNumber.name: Add random number to name

npcMystifierDemystifyAllTokensBasedOnThe.hint: Check to enable all mystified tokens on the active scene with the same base actor as the token being renamed also being demystified.
npcMystifierDemystifyAllTokensBasedOnThe.name: Demystify all tokens of actor

npcMystifierFilterAlignmentTraits.hint: Check to enable filter out alignment traits from the mystified name.
npcMystifierFilterAlignmentTraits.name: Exclude npc alignment traits.

npcMystifierFilterBlacklist.hint: Add words to enable filtering out what's this comma-separated blocklist from the mystified name.
npcMystifierFilterBlacklist.name: Blocklist traits to never add

npcMystifierFilterCreatureFamilyTraits.hint: Check to enable filtering out creature family traits (see https://2e.aonprd.com/MonsterFamilies.aspx?Type=M) from the mystified name.
npcMystifierFilterCreatureFamilyTraits.name: Exclude creature family traits.

npcMystifierFilterCreatureTypesTraits.hint: Check to enable filtering out creature type traits (see https://2e.aonprd.com/Traits.aspx) from the mystified name.
npcMystifierFilterCreatureTypesTraits.name: Exclude creature type traits

npcMystifierFilterEliteWeak.hint: Check to enable filtering out elite/weak from the mystified name.
npcMystifierFilterEliteWeak.name: Exclude elite/weak status

npcMystifierFilterOtherTraits.hint: Check to enable filtering out npc traits not in the above trait types (see the links in the above setting options) from the mystified name.
npcMystifierFilterOtherTraits.name: Exclude other traits

npcMystifierFilterRarities.hint: Check to enable filtering out rarities from the mystified name.
npcMystifierFilterRarities.name: Exclude rarity

npcMystifierFilterRaritiesReplacement.hint: Put word to replace rarities greater than Common with (e.g. 'Unusual') in this text field. If empty, do not change the displayed rarity.
npcMystifierFilterRaritiesReplacement.name: Replace rarities rarer than Common

npcMystifierKeepNumberAtEndOfName.hint: Check to enable keeping token number *in the same format as those added by this module* at end of name (if any) when mystifying/demystifying npcs.
npcMystifierKeepNumberAtEndOfName.name: Keep token number when mystifying/demystifying.

npcMystifierMethod.hint: Currently Mystifying by using the NPCs traits is the only supported option.
npcMystifierMethod.name: How to generate mystified npc names.

npcMystifierModifierKey.hint: Select to enable setting which key to hold to mystify creature as it's dragged out to the active scene. Note that if you choose Alt (not the default) it also hides the npc.
npcMystifierModifierKey.name: Key to mystify on drag to scene

npcMystifierMystifyKey.hint: Set keybind to mystify selected tokens.
npcMystifierMystifyKey.name: Keybind for mystifying selected tokens

npcMystifierPostfix.hint: Add text to postfix new name with, defaults to '' (example: 'Creature'), if this matches the name of a rollable table a random text result from this table will be used as the postfix instead.
npcMystifierPostfix.name: Word or rollable table postfix

npcMystifierPrefix.hint: Add text to prefix new name with, defaults to '' (example: 'Unknown'), if this matches the name of a rollable table a random text result from this table will be used as the prefix instead.
npcMystifierPrefix.name: Word or rollable table prefix

npcMystifierSkipRandomNumberForUnique.hint: Check to enable skipping adding a random number when mystifying unique npcs.
npcMystifierSkipRandomNumberForUnique.name: Skip random number for unique npcs.

npcMystifierUseMystifiedNameInChat.hint: (Experimental) Check to enable using mystified name inside chat messages by replacing the actor name with the mystified name. Will doubtlessly look real bad on some abilities.
npcMystifierUseMystifiedNameInChat.name: (Experimental) Mystify name in chat messages.

npcMystifierUseSize.hint: Check to enable using the actor's size in the mystified name
npcMystifierUseSize.name: Use actor size

creatureBuilder.hint: Check to allow building custom creatures according to GMG rules.
creatureBuilder.name: Allow building custom creatures.

npcRoller.hint: Check to enable the NPC quick roller utility.
npcRoller.name: Enable NPC roller utility

reminderBreathWeapon.hint: Check to set reminder for breath weapon use.
reminderBreathWeapon.name: Breath weapon reminder

reminderCannotAttack.hint: Check to show reminder if attacking with a token that cannot attack due to being unconscious/dead/defeated/no hp/etc.
reminderCannotAttack.name: Reminder if attacking with token unable to attack
reminderCannotAttack.note: Are you sure about this attack? {actorName} {reason}, and thus not likely to be able attack...

reminderIWR.hint: Check to show reminder for IWR when damage is taken. Currently only handles 'simple' damage types (e.g. handles ones like 'Bludgeoning' or 'Fire', not ones like 'All' or 'Physical')
reminderIWR.name: IWR reminder

reminderTargeting.hint: Check to show reminder for targeting in combat.
reminderTargeting.name: Targeting reminder

quickQuantities.hint: Use shift-click on item quantities to add 5, ctrl-click to add 10.
quickQuantities.name: Use shift-click on item quantities to add 5, ctrl-click to add 10.

actionsReminderAllow.hint: Check to show number of actions reminder as chat message.
actionsReminderAllow.name: Who gets an actions reminder

actionsReminderAutoReduceStunned.hint: Client setting to automatically reduce Stunned on turn start.
actionsReminderAutoReduceStunned.name: Automatically reduce stunned on turn start

addUserTargets.hint: Keybind to add selected and hovered tokens to the chosen user's targets.
addUserTargets.name: Add user targets
addUserTargets.title: Select user to add targets for

playerItemsRarityColour.hint: Client setting to show item names in rarity colour on actor sheets.
playerItemsRarityColour.name: Show item names in rarity colour on actor sheets.
